name: VR Future Wars: Aircraft Carrier-UAV Confrontation
name_original: VR Future Wars: Aircraft Carrier-UAV Confrontation
description:
It's time to show off your superb flying combat skills! Wearing a VR helmet, you will act as an air force, driving the top fighter Su-33, taking off from the aircraft carrier on the sea, driving into the vast high altitude, and completing the task of defending the aircraft carrier.
Players need to fight the drone group alone in the high air, launch missiles by operating the gamepad, and annihilate the surrounding enemy forces. If they are defeated, the aircraft carrier will explode and the mission will fail.


Movement mode: 1. The direction buttons on the left handle can change the pitch and steering of the aircraft; 2. The direction buttons on the right handle can change the roll and speed
Attack mode: When entering the attack state, press the trigger buttons of the two handles to launch bullets or missiles
Menu: 1. When the menu interface appears on the interface, the right handle can change the click position, and the right handle trigger key can press the corresponding button; 2. When in the fighting state, press the menu button to call out the menu interface, press the menu button again to cancel Menu interface
